summary: To meet the desires and needs of the parents, a marriage is arranged between 14-year-old Gjino and 20-year-old Marigo. Gjino reluctantly obeys, but Marigo, who loves another, tries various ... See full summary »
cast: Elvira Diamanti|Xhevdet Ferri|Mimika Luca|Mira Minga|Zef Mosi|Robert Ndrenika|Hajrie Rondo|Admir Sorra|Xhemil Tagani
title: Përralle Nga e Kaluara
